review: It's not quite as fast as I expected, in two ways. They brag about how there is more RAM and better wifi on this device when compared to the Chromecast. I have the Chromecast and I can safely say that both the interface and wifi are slower on the Fire TV stick. I never experience any sluggishness or buffering with the Chromecast, but I have with the Fire TV stick. That being said, I love that there are built in apps and a remote with this as opposed to the Chromecast. If a remote is important to you, this is definitely your devices.
